pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Methods for Bayesian Treatment Effect Models // Functions for extracting tidy data from Bayesian treatment effect models, in particular BART, but extensions are possible. Functionality includes extracting tidy posterior summaries as in 'tidybayes' https://github.com/mjskay/tidybayes, estimating (average) treatment effects, common support calculations, and plotting useful summaries of these.
